===============
render
===============

{{ }}
{{ "foo" if false }}
{{ var[42].foo }}
{{ async_func() + normal_func() }}
{{ outer("FOO") }}
{{ users()|selectattr("is_active")|map(attribute="name")|join("|") }}

{%+ if something +%}yay{%+ endif +%}
{{+ something +}}

--------
